snippet: The National Labor Relations Board concluded that a federal law affirming the right of workers to engage in concerted action trumps any agreement barring group claims.
abstract: The National Labor Relations Board concludes that a federal law affirming the right of workers to engage in concerted action trumps any arbitration agreement barring group claims; decision will no doubt anger many companies.
